CustomField.description: -Develop long term sustainability via HR-related SOP, software to monitor/control, renewal of Group H&S insurance, workmen compensation, etc. -Support current and future business needs through the development, engagement, motivation and preservation of human capital (Eg staff training, skills upgrade, career progression, and welfare) -Perform the full lifecycle recruitment process, when required, and ensure that this is carried out in accordance with operating procedures and adhere to best practice principles. -Analyze Industry trends -Schedule and conduct meetings with departments to proactively identify topics to be addressed or areas in need of additional instruction
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Develop long term sustainability via HR-related SOP, software to monitor/control, renewal of Group H&S insurance, workmen compensation, etc. -Support current and future business needs through the development, engagement, motivation and preservation of human capital (Eg staff training, skills upgrade, career progression, and welfare) -Perform the full lifecycle recruitment process, when required, and ensure that this is carried out in accordance with operating procedures and adhere to best practice
CustomField.label: Industry Best Practices [HR]
